org.sd.text.align
Class BaseAligner<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.align.AbstractAligner<T>
      org.sd.text.align.BaseAligner<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
WordAligner
public class BaseAligner<T>
extends AbstractAligner<T>

Base alignment class.

Note that alignment is based on the "equals" and "hashCode" methods of T.

Author:
Spence Koehler
